nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "permission denied, only owner of this contract has the permission."

arguments.value: permission denied, only owner of this contract has the permission.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "permission denied, only owner of this contract has the permission."

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "the newOwner's address should not be 0x0"

arguments.value: the newOwner's address should not be 0x0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "the newOwner's address should not be 0x0"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership
